audioText: Je partirai en randonnée dans les Alpes dès que les conditions météorologiques seront favorables pour l'expédition.
question: When will the speaker go hiking in the Alps?
options: As soon as weather conditions are favorable for the expedition
When the hiking season officially begins
Once they have purchased all necessary equipment
explanation: The text states 'Je partirai en randonnée dans les Alpes dès que les conditions météorologiques seront favorables pour l'expédition' - I will go hiking in the Alps as soon as weather conditions are favorable for the expedition. 'Partirai' is the first person singular future tense of 'partir' (to leave), indicating a planned future action.
